name: AlarmNotificationRouterPremium
author: CWC AI Creator
description: Premium Shift-based alarm routing control with HMI File Persistence and Background Logic

properties.name: configFilePath
properties.description: Path to the TSV file on the HMI storage

properties.name: tsvSource
properties.description: Raw TSV content. Bind this to a retentive HMI Tag for persistence.

properties.name: autoSelectByShift
properties.description: Enable automatic selection based on time

properties.name: selectedEmail
properties.description: The currently selected/active recipient email (Bind to routing tag)

properties.name: manualTheme
properties.description: Selected theme when mode is manual

events.name: SelectionChanged
events.description: Fires when a new recipient is selected (Auto or Manual)

events.name: ThemeChanged
events.description: Fires when the UI theme toggles

events.name: Confirmed
events.description: Fires when settings are applied in the editor (Trigger HMI File Save here)

methods.name: syncFromTSV
methods.description: Loads TSV string content into the control from HMI storage

methods.name: setSystemHour
methods.description: Updates the internal logic clock from HMI system time
